channel.title: Frozen Modification with big red button
channel.description: This is our "basic" 6V modification from Variety KC GoBabyGo. We've found that the Frozen car is a great size for most kids age 2-5, but we have done this modification for a child as young as 10 months and some smaller older kids can fit as well. Build guide DRAFT for FROZEN.pdf (1.2 MB)

item.title: Frozen Modification with big red button
item.dc:creator: PennStateHealth
item.description:
Thank you very much for the instructions, I am hoping to use this as my first modified car.

Emily
